Package <Unnamed>

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    DrawType
    this interface is for giving card to player after using DrawType
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Board
    this class represents the board in game which has a Card on it and has Color too
    Card
    this abstract class represent a Card with it's attributes and behavior
    ColorCard
    this abstract class represents a color card type it extends Card class
    ColorDrawCard
    this class represents colorDraw (Draw 2+) card this extends Color card
    Game
    this class represents the Main class of project which contains starting , stopping , play the game
    GameDirection
    this class is for holding Direction of Game
    GameHandler
    this class is the central logic unit of Game
    GameMultiPlayer
    this class represents MultiPlayerGame this extends Game
    GameOnePlayer
    this class represents OnePlayerGame
    HumanPlayer
    this class represents a Human Player this extends Player
    MachinePlayer
    this class represents MachinePlayer this extends Player
    NumericCard
    this class represent a numeric card
    Player
    this class represents a Player in game
    Printer
    this class will be used for printing anything on console for user
    Reader
    this class is for reading from console
    ReverseCard
    this class represents reverse card this extends color cards
    Run
    this class is for running the game
    SequenceKeeper
    this class will save the sequence of using wildDraw and Draw Sequence
    SkipCard
    this class represents SkipCard this extends ColorCard
    Storage
    this class is the Storage of game which keep a total cards in it
    Turn
    this class represents turn in game
    UserInterface
    this class is for UserInterFace
    WildCard
    this abstract class represents a wild card type it extends Card class
    WildColorCard
    this class represent a wild four color card this extends wildCard
    WildDrawCard
    this class represent a wild Draw color card this extends wildCard
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Color
    this Enum holds colors with their ANSI code
    Direction
    this Enum holds Direction of Game : counterClockWise , ClockWise
